desc: Our line up of all natural skin care products are produced with goats milk harvested here on our Tennessee farm. Enjoy softer and better looking skin by switching to goats milk soap today.

layout.text: 100% All Natural Goat Milk Skin Care
At Num-Num's Mountain our skin care products are created using milk from our own goats. The milk is then combined with carefully selected oils to make each and every product an aromatic experience.
